dialogue: Wow, You did it, I mean I guess that's all I got you at this point! Feel free to experiment, around with the game and let me know what you think.
More will be coming soon, I promise! I have a ton of ideas for the rest of this level, and I can't wait to see what you think of them!
If you have any feedback, please reach out to me through some channel, either from the itch.io page or the Community Discord server.
In the meanwhile, the game comes with a speedrun timer, and there is a running leaderboard that I'd love to see your name on!.
So if you'd like to restart your progress and go for a better time, enable the timer in the settings menu.
Then press [color=yellow]'~' + 'Delete'[/color] keys to restart the game to the very beginning. Or you could just use your current runs time if you're happy with it!
Good Luck, and Thank you for playing!
